statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE financial_system = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT incident_date, financial_system FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE financial_system IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE financial_system = 'Banking' AND incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE financial_system LIKE '%Gov%' ORDER BY incident_type ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, evidence FROM security_incidents WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND incident_type <> 'Physical Security';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM FinancialSystems WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT breach_id, affected_records FROM DataBreaches WHERE affected_records > 10000;
SELECT investigation_id, incident_id, investigator_name, findings FROM Investigations ORDER BY investigation_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, description, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS total_investigations FROM Investigations GROUP BY incident_id;
SELECT incident_date, description, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT S.system_name, I.investigator_name, I.findings FROM FinancialSystems S JOIN Investigations I ON S.system_id = I.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT breach_type, breach_date, affected_records FROM data_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, findings FROM analysis_reports WHERE financial_system_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE financial_system_id = 100;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, breach_date FROM data_breaches WHERE affected_records > 1000 ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, findings FROM analysis_reports WHERE financial_system_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents JOIN data_breaches ON security_incidents.financial_system_id = data_breaches.financial_system_id;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, financial_system_id FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE affected_accounts > 100;
SELECT * FROM data_breaches ORDER BY breach_date;
SELECT breach_description, data_leaked_amount FROM data_breaches WHERE data_leaked_amount >= 1000;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, affected_accounts FROM security_incidents WHERE affected_accounts > 100;
SELECT system_name, system_owner FROM financial_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT breach_description, breach_date, data_leaked_amount FROM data_breaches WHERE data_leaked_amount > 1000 ORDER BY data_leaked_amount DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_details FROM incident_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM Incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT incident_id, findings FROM Analysis WHERE conclusion = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, financial_system FROM Incidents WHERE financial_system = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT event_date, event_type FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Evidence JOIN Incidents ON Evidence.incident_id = Incidents.id;
